verses.verse: וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer spake יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh that the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to מֹשֶׁ֔ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh, unto Moses וְאֶ֧ל <S%H413><s%> ve-'El and to אֶלְעָזָ֛ר <S%H499><s%> 'el-'a-Zar and unto Eleazar בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son אַהֲרֹ֥ן <S%H175><s%> 'a-ha-Ron of Aaron הַכֹּהֵ֖ן <S%H3548><s%> hak-ko-Hen the priest לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> le-Mor. saying

שְׂא֞וּ <S%H5375><s%> se-'U Take אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- רֹ֣אשׁ׀ <S%H7218><s%> rosh the sum כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- of all עֲדַ֣ת <S%H5712><s%> 'a-Dat of all the congregation בְּנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> be-nei- of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel מִבֶּ֨ן <S%H1121><s%> mib-Ben old עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <S%H6242><s%> 'es-Rim from twenty שָׁנָ֛ה <S%H8141><s%> sha-Nah years וָמַ֖עְלָה <S%H4605><s%> va-Ma'-lah and upward לְבֵ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> le-Veit house אֲבֹתָ֑ם <S%H1><s%> 'a-vo-Tam; throughout their fathers' כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- whoever יֹצֵ֥א <S%H3318><s%> yo-Tze all that are able to go צָבָ֖א <S%H6635><s%> tza-Va to war בְּיִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> be-Yis-ra-'El. in Israel

וַיְדַבֵּ֨ר <S%H1696><s%> vay-dab-Ber spake מֹשֶׁ֜ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh And Moses וְאֶלְעָזָ֧ר <S%H499><s%> ve-'el-'a-Zar and Eleazar הַכֹּהֵ֛ן <S%H3548><s%> hak-ko-Hen the priest אֹתָ֖ם <S%H854><s%> 'o-Tam in בְּעַֽרְבֹ֣ת <S%H6160><s%> be-'ar-Vot with them in the plains מוֹאָ֑ב <S%H4124><s%> mo-'Av; of Moab עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- by יַרְדֵּ֥ן <S%H3383><s%> yar-Den by Jordan יְרֵח֖וֹ <S%H3405><s%> ye-re-Cho [near] Jericho לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> le-Mor. saying

מִבֶּ֛ן <S%H1121><s%> mib-Ben old עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <S%H6242><s%> 'es-Rim [Take the sum of the people] from twenty שָׁנָ֖ה <S%H8141><s%> sha-Nah years וָמָ֑עְלָה <S%H4605><s%> va-Ma-'e-lah; and upward כַּאֲשֶׁר֩ <S%H834><s%> ka-'a-Sher after צִוָּ֨ה <S%H6680><s%> tziv-Vah commanded יְהוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh as the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- מֹשֶׁה֙ <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh Moses וּבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> u-ve-Nei and the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel הַיֹּצְאִ֖ים <S%H3318><s%> hai-yo-tze-'Im which went forth מֵאֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> me-'E-retz out of the land מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <S%H4714><s%> mitz-Ra-yim. of Egypt

רְאוּבֵ֖ן <S%H7205><s%> re-'u-Ven Reuben בְּכ֣וֹר <S%H1060><s%> be-Chor the eldest יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El; son of Israel בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei the children רְאוּבֵ֗ן <S%H7205><s%> re-'u-Ven, of Reuben חֲנוֹךְ֙ <S%H2585><s%> cha-noCh Hanoch מִשְׁפַּ֣חַת <S%H4940><s%> mish-Pa-chat [of whom cometh] the family הַחֲנֹכִ֔י <S%H2599><s%> ha-cha-no-Chi, of the Hanochites לְפַלּ֕וּא <S%H6396><s%> le-fal-Lu of Pallu מִשְׁפַּ֖חַת <S%H4940><s%> mish-Pa-chat the family הַפַּלֻּאִֽי׃ <S%H6384><s%> hap-pal-lu-'I. of the Palluites

לְחֶצְרֹ֕ן <S%H2696><s%> le-chetz-Ron Of Hezron מִשְׁפַּ֖חַת <S%H4940><s%> mish-Pa-chat the family הַֽחֶצְרוֹנִ֑י <S%H2697><s%> ha-chetz-ro-Ni; of the Hezronites לְכַרְמִ֕י <S%H3756><s%> le-char-Mi of Carmi מִשְׁפַּ֖חַת <S%H4940><s%> mish-Pa-chat the family הַכַּרְמִֽי׃ <S%H3757><s%> hak-kar-Mi. of the Carmites

אֵ֖לֶּה <S%H428><s%> 'El-leh These מִשְׁפְּחֹ֣ת <S%H4940><s%> mish-pe-Chot These [are] the families הָרֻֽאוּבֵנִ֑י <S%H7206><s%> ha-ru-'u-ve-Ni; of the Reubenites וַיִּהְי֣וּ <S%H1961><s%> vai-yih-Yu become פְקֻדֵיהֶ֗ם <S%H6485><s%> fe-ku-dei-Hem, and they that were numbered שְׁלֹשָׁ֤ה <S%H7969><s%> she-lo-Shah and three וְאַרְבָּעִים֙ <S%H705><s%> ve-'ar-ba-'Im of them were forty אֶ֔לֶף <S%H505><s%> 'E-lef, thousand וּשְׁבַ֥ע <S%H7651><s%> u-she-Va' and seven מֵא֖וֹת <S%H3967><s%> me-'ot hundred וּשְׁלֹשִֽׁים׃ <S%H7970><s%> u-she-lo-Shim. and thirty
וּבְנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> u-ve-Nei And the sons פַלּ֖וּא <S%H6396><s%> fal-Lu of Pallu אֱלִיאָֽב׃ <S%H446><s%> 'e-li-'Av. Eliab

וּבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> u-ve-Nei And the sons אֱלִיאָ֔ב <S%H446><s%> 'e-li-'Av, of Eliab נְמוּאֵ֖ל <S%H5241><s%> ne-mu-'El Nemuel וְדָתָ֣ן <S%H1885><s%> ve-da-Tan and Dathan וַאֲבִירָ֑ם <S%H48><s%> va-'a-vi-Ram; and Abiram הֽוּא־ <S%H1931><s%> hu- These דָתָ֨ן <S%H1885><s%> da-Tan This [is that] Dathan וַאֲבִירָ֜ם <S%H48><s%> va-'a-vi-Ram and Abiram; קְרוּאֵי ke-ru-'ei כקְרִיאֵ֣י <S%H7148><s%> ke-ri-'Ei famous קהָעֵדָ֗ה <S%H5712><s%> ha-'e-Dah, in the congregation אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who הִצּ֜וּ <S%H5327><s%> hitz-Tzu who strove עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- against מֹשֶׁ֤ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh against Moses וְעַֽל־ <S%H5921><s%> ve-'al- and against אַהֲרֹן֙ <S%H175><s%> 'a-ha-Ron and against Aaron בַּעֲדַת־ <S%H5712><s%> ba-'a-dat- in the company קֹ֔רַח <S%H7141><s%> Ko-rach, of Korah בְּהַצֹּתָ֖ם <S%H5327><s%> be-hatz-tzo-Tam when they strove עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- against יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. against the LORD

וַתִּפְתַּ֨ח <S%H6605><s%> vat-tif-Tach opened הָאָ֜רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz And the earth אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- פִּ֗יהָ <S%H6310><s%> Pi-ha, her mouth וַתִּבְלַ֥ע <S%H1104><s%> vat-tiv-La' and swallowed them up אֹתָ֛ם <S%H853><s%> 'o-Tam וְאֶת־ <S%H854><s%> ve-'Et with קֹ֖רַח <S%H7141><s%> Ko-rach together with Korah בְּמ֣וֹת <S%H4194><s%> be-Mot died הָעֵדָ֑ה <S%H5712><s%> ha-'e-Dah; when that company בַּאֲכֹ֣ל <S%H398><s%> ba-'a-Chol devoured הָאֵ֗שׁ <S%H784><s%> ha-'Esh, what time the fire אֵ֣ת <S%H853><s%> 'et חֲמִשִּׁ֤ים <S%H2572><s%> cha-mish-Shim and fifty וּמָאתַ֙יִם֙ <S%H3967><s%> u-ma-Ta-yim two hundred אִ֔ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'Ish, men וַיִּהְי֖וּ <S%H1961><s%> vai-yih-Yu became לְנֵֽס׃ <S%H5251><s%> le-Nes. and they became a sign
וּבְנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> u-ve-nei- Notwithstanding the children קֹ֖רַח <S%H7141><s%> Ko-rach of Korah לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- did not מֵֽתוּ׃ <S%H4191><s%> Me-tu. died ס sa-Mek

בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei The sons שִׁמְעוֹן֮ <S%H8095><s%> shim-'On of Simeon לְמִשְׁפְּחֹתָם֒ <S%H4940><s%> le-mish-pe-cho-Tam after their families לִנְמוּאֵ֗ל <S%H5241><s%> lin-mu-'El, of Nemuel מִשְׁפַּ֙חַת֙ <S%H4940><s%> mish-Pa-chat the family הַנְּמ֣וּאֵלִ֔י <S%H5242><s%> han-ne-Mu-'e-Li, of the Nemuelites לְיָמִ֕ין <S%H3226><s%> le-ya-Min of Jamin מִשְׁפַּ֖חַת <S%H4940><s%> mish-Pa-chat the family הַיָּמִינִ֑י <S%H3228><s%> hai-ya-mi-Ni; of the Jaminites לְיָכִ֕ין <S%H3199><s%> le-ya-Chin of Jachin מִשְׁפַּ֖חַת <S%H4940><s%> mish-Pa-chat the family הַיָּכִינִֽי׃ <S%H3200><s%> hai-ya-chi-Ni. of the Jachinites

אֵ֖לֶּה <S%H428><s%> 'El-leh These מִשְׁפְּחֹ֣ת <S%H4940><s%> mish-pe-Chot These [are] the families הַשִּׁמְעֹנִ֑י <S%H8099><s%> hash-shim-'o-Ni; of the Simeonites שְׁנַ֧יִם <S%H8147><s%> she-Na-yim and two וְעֶשְׂרִ֛ים <S%H6242><s%> ve-'es-Rim twenty אֶ֖לֶף <S%H505><s%> 'E-lef thousand וּמָאתָֽיִם׃ <S%H3967><s%> u-ma-Ta-yim. and two hundred ס sa-Mek

לְאָזְנִ֕י <S%H244><s%> le-'a-ze-Ni Of Ozni מִשְׁפַּ֖חַת <S%H4940><s%> mish-Pa-chat the family הָאָזְנִ֑י <S%H244><s%> ha-'a-ze-Ni; of the Oznites לְעֵרִ֕י <S%H6179><s%> le-'e-Ri of Eri מִשְׁפַּ֖חַת <S%H4940><s%> mish-Pa-chat the family הָעֵרִֽי׃ <S%H6180><s%> ha-'e-Ri. of the Erites

וַיִּהְי֣וּ <S%H1961><s%> vai-yih-Yu become בְנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> ve-nei- And the sons פֶ֔רֶץ <S%H6557><s%> Fe-retz, of Pharez לְחֶצְרֹ֕ן <S%H2696><s%> le-chetz-Ron were of Hezron מִשְׁפַּ֖חַת <S%H4940><s%> mish-Pa-chat the family הַֽחֶצְרֹנִ֑י <S%H2697><s%> ha-chetz-ro-Ni; of the Hezronites לְחָמ֕וּל <S%H2538><s%> le-cha-Mul of Hamul מִשְׁפַּ֖חַת <S%H4940><s%> mish-Pa-chat the family הֶחָמוּלִֽי׃ <S%H2539><s%> he-cha-mu-Li. of the Hamulites
